Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to give you this as a 'thank you' for letting me live here with you. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to give you this as a 'thank you' for letting me live here with you.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Have you encountered others like me, in the mines? I'm sorry if they were hostile towards you. You see, we've learned to fear humans... there have been too many... unpleasant encounters.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Have you encountered others like me, in the mines? I'm sorry if they were hostile towards you. You see, we've learned to fear humans... there have been too many... unpleasant encounters.

Entries.DialogueText: You haven't... slain any of my friends, have you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You haven't... slain any of my friends, have you?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, a gift to remember the day that I hatched! Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, a gift to remember the day that I hatched! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: The flow of water has been unusually strong today... what's going on up there?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The flow of water has been unusually strong today... what's going on up there?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... is this what you call a 'birthday present'? I don't understand humans... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... is this what you call a 'birthday present'? I don't understand humans...

Entries.DialogueText: Is that Stardrop Tea? Thank you! One drop makes my room smell good for the whole day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is that Stardrop Tea? Thank you! One drop makes my room smell good for the whole day.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, look! All my friends are in here! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, look! All my friends are in here!

Entries.DialogueText: Wait a minute, is that me...? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait a minute, is that me...?

Entries.DialogueText: A gift of lovely perfume? Oh, {Farmer_Name}... I'm blushing, but you probably can't notice... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A gift of lovely perfume? Oh, ... I'm blushing, but you probably can't notice...

Entries.DialogueText: This smells delicious! I'll eat half, and use the other half to moisturize my body... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This smells delicious! I'll eat half, and use the other half to moisturize my body...

Entries.DialogueText: A 1000 year war between my people and the dwarves recently ended. There's still a lot of resentment on both sides.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A 1000 year war between my people and the dwarves recently ended. There's still a lot of resentment on both sides.

Entries.DialogueText: Please keep my location a secret. If the dwarves knew of me, they'd surely send an assassin.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please keep my location a secret. If the dwarves knew of me, they'd surely send an assassin.

Entries.DialogueText: I try not to make too much noise down here. Imagine if the townspeople heard my weird sounds coming from the sewer drain...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I try not to make too much noise down here. Imagine if the townspeople heard my weird sounds coming from the sewer drain...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm a little bruised, but I'm okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm a little bruised, but I'm okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's an arctic shard! That's a very rare magical item.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's an arctic shard! That's a very rare magical item.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd bring that to the Wizard if I were you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd bring that to the Wizard if I were you!

Entries.DialogueText: I find things here and I sell them. Care to buy anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I find things here and I sell them. Care to buy anything?

Entries.DialogueText: If you put your ear up to the right pipe, you can hear into any house from down here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you put your ear up to the right pipe, you can hear into any house from down here.

Entries.DialogueText: I wouldn't eavesdrop, though! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wouldn't eavesdrop, though!

Entries.DialogueText: Please don't tell anyone about me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please don't tell anyone about me.

Entries.DialogueText: Humans tend to destroy things they can't understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Humans tend to destroy things they can't understand.

Entries.DialogueText: Please don't tell anyone about me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please don't tell anyone about me.

Entries.DialogueText: Most humans are frightened by us shadow people... maybe for good reason. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most humans are frightened by us shadow people... maybe for good reason.

Entries.DialogueText: But regardless, if the townspeople knew about me, I might not be safe here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But regardless, if the townspeople knew about me, I might not be safe here.

Entries.DialogueText: I am too sensitive to sunlight to go out on most days.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I am too sensitive to sunlight to go out on most days.

Entries.DialogueText: The conditions in here are perfect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The conditions in here are perfect.

Entries.DialogueText: Care to buy anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Care to buy anything?

Entries.DialogueText: Please, don't be alarmed. I am different than the others.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please, don't be alarmed. I am different than the others.

Entries.DialogueText: I've spent a lot of time observing humans. I know you like to shop. Care to see my wares?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've spent a lot of observing humans. I know you like to shop. Care to see my wares?

Entries.DialogueText: Back again? I suppose it does fit into my theory of human behavior.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Back again? I suppose it does fit into my theory of human behavior.

Entries.DialogueText: 'Krobus' means 'bridge-crosser' in our language.
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'Krobus' means 'bridge-crosser' in our language.

Entries.DialogueText: On Fridays I stay silent as a sign of devotion to Yoba.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On Fridays I stay silent as a sign of devotion to Yoba.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd love to see more of the outside world, but it wouldn't be safe for me. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd love to see more of the outside world, but it wouldn't be safe for me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll never know what it's like to be human... but talking to you, I feel like I understand it a little.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll never know what it's like to be human... but talking to you, I feel like I understand it a little.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Sorry, I'm still a little wary of humans. My shop is still open to you, however.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Sorry, I'm still a little wary of humans. My shop is still open to you, however.

Entries.DialogueText: You're not like the other humans, are you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're not like the other humans, are you?

Entries.DialogueText: You've opened my eyes to the world of humans. I appreciate that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've opened my eyes to the world of humans. I appreciate that.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... I'm afraid we'll have to keep this a secret... Neither my people nor yours would accept us living together.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... I'm afraid we'll have to keep this a secret... Neither my people nor yours would accept us living together.

Entries.DialogueText: You know I'll be a very strange person to live with, right? I won't be able to leave the house...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know I'll be a very strange person to live with, right? I won't be able to leave the house...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Do you still like me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still like me?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Maybe I should've stayed with my own kind. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe I should've stayed with my own kind.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you still happy, living with me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy, living with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.

Entries.DialogueText: I think you'd be happier living with another human... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think you'd be happier living with another human...

Entries.DialogueText: I've detected a change in your behavior... what does it mean? *groan* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've detected a change in your behavior... what does it mean? *groan*

Entries.DialogueText: You only have one short life to live... are you certain you want to spend it with a hideous creature like me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You only have one short life to live... are you certain you want to spend it with a hideous creature like me?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...

Entries.DialogueText: You seem unhappy lately... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You seem unhappy lately...

Entries.DialogueText: I miss the sewers. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I miss the sewers.

Entries.DialogueText: This weather feels pretty nice after the heat of summer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This weather feels pretty nice after the heat of summer.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?

Entries.DialogueText: If I showed up to the Spirit's Eve festival they'd put me in a cage... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I showed up to the Spirit's Eve festival they'd put me in a cage...

Entries.DialogueText: I don't feel like doing anything today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't feel like doing anything today.

Entries.DialogueText: It's been feeling a bit cooler lately, with a musty smell. You call this time of year 'fall', correct?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been feeling a bit cooler lately, with a musty smell. You call this of year 'fall', correct?

Entries.DialogueText: We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful.

Entries.DialogueText: I feel a sensation in my body... is this... 'platonic love'? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel a sensation in my body... is this... 'platonic love'?

Entries.DialogueText: ... Oh, wait... I'm just shedding my skin. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... Oh, wait... I'm just shedding my skin.

Entries.DialogueText: I've learned to overcome my bias against humans... but Dwarves still disgust me. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've learned to overcome my bias against humans... but Dwarves still disgust me.

Entries.DialogueText: You started nibbling on me during the night, and mumbling about 'black lick or ish'... what did you mean by that? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You started nibbling on me during the night, and mumbling about 'black lick or ish'... what did you mean by that?

Entries.DialogueText: This place is my home now... I'm happy here. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is my home now... I'm happy here.

Entries.DialogueText: I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful place. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful .

Entries.DialogueText: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be careful out there! Somes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a simple life, but I like it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a simple life, but I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: If I could come help you, I would... but I'll do my best to keep the house in order.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I could come help you, I would... but I'll do my best to keep the house in order.

Entries.DialogueText: I tried my best to make human food... [203 204 651 225]
Entries.DisplayPattern: I tried my best to make human food...

Entries.DialogueText: You can eat it later, don't worry about it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can eat it later, don't worry about it...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy here, in the house. I like to spend all my time in a good spot... I don't need to "get out" like humans do.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy here, in the house. I like to spend all my in a good spot... I don't need to "get out" like humans do.

Entries.DialogueText: But I understand that you need to! Please don't feel like you have to stay here with me. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I understand that you need to! Please don't feel like you have to stay here with me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm considering spending my day all balled up and wedged in the corner...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm considering spending my day all balled up and wedged in the corner...

Entries.DialogueText: What? You mean you don't do that? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What? You mean you don't do that?

Entries.DialogueText: On Fridays, I like to stay quiet out of respect for Yoba. I hope you don't mind.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On Fridays, I like to stay quiet out of respect for Yoba. I hope you don't mind.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I could help you on the farm, but I can't go out in the sun...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I could help you on the , but I can't go out in the sun...

Entries.DialogueText: I cleaned all the bugs out of the house today... Sorry, I didn't save you any! *smack* {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I cleaned all the bugs out of the house today... Sorry, I didn't save you any! *smack*

Entries.DialogueText: You feel solid... sometimes I wish I had bones, too... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You feel solid... somes I wish I had bones, too...

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I wonder if humans and shadow people could really ever co-exist... It's a lovely idea, but is it realistic? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes I wonder if humans and shadow people could really ever co-exist... It's a lovely idea, but is it realistic?

Entries.DialogueText: I hope so...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope so...

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...

Entries.DialogueText: I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.

Entries.DialogueText: I want to be a good housemate for you, but I never know if I'm doing well... *groan* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to be a good housemate for you, but I never know if I'm doing well... *groan*

Entries.DialogueText: I have a hard time understanding human expression. B... but... you're happy living with me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have a hard understanding human expression. B... but... you're happy living with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Okay! {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!

Entries.DialogueText: I won't ever grow old, but you will. Sometimes it makes me sad... but that's okay. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I won't ever grow old, but you will. Somes it makes me sad... but that's okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think your Grandpa would approve of a monster living in his house?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think your Grandpa would approve of a monster living in his house?

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think we could get in trouble for living together? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think we could get in trouble for living together?

Entries.DialogueText: It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't go outside, I can only eat certain food, I need the temperature a certain way... I hope it's not too much of a bother to live with me, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't go outside, I can only eat certain food, I need the temperature a certain way... I hope it's not too much of a bother to live with me, .

Entries.DialogueText: Welwick says I'm cursed today. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welwick says I'm cursed today.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll tell you a secret... I don't actually sleep, I just lay there with my eyes closed...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll tell you a secret... I don't actually sleep, I just lay there with my eyes closed...

Entries.DialogueText: You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Where am I supposed to sleep...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where am I supposed to sleep...?

Entries.DialogueText: I wasn't able to sleep well last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wasn't able to sleep well last night...

Entries.DialogueText: I had to sleep on the floor last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had to sleep on the floor last night...

Entries.DialogueText: Did something happen to our bed...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did something happen to our bed...?

Entries.DialogueText: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you spent any with today?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if will grow up to be a er like you?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll feed today. You can just focus on running the .

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not sure how, but Yoba has blessed this house with a 'child'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not sure how, but Yoba has blessed this house with a 'child'...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll stay out here for just a bit, but we've got to be careful... if anyone approaches I'll need to hide!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll stay out here for just a bit, but we've got to be careful... if anyone approaches I'll need to hide!

Entries.DialogueText: It's rare that I can step outside!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's rare that I can step outside!

Entries.DialogueText: What a beautiful day! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What a beautiful day!

Entries.DialogueText: Wide open spaces make me nervous... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wide open spaces make me nervous...

Entries.DialogueText: Please go about your day, I'll just stay here and guard the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please go about your day, I'll just stay here and guard the house.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll wait here for a bit, and see if any bugs come my way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll wait here for a bit, and see if any bugs come my way.

Entries.DialogueText: I haven't had breakfast yet!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I haven't had breakfast yet!

Entries.DialogueText: Do you like rainy days as much as I do, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you like rainy days as much as I do, ?

Entries.DialogueText: We're different in so many ways... but that's alright.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're different in so many ways... but that's alright.

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, {Farmer_Name}. I went out early and found this for you. [305 308 203 795 397]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, . I went out early and found this for you.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope it's not too strange.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope it's not too strange.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if the wizard knows about... this? I hope he can keep a secret. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if the wizard knows about... this? I hope he can keep a secret.

Entries.DialogueText: As much as I try to be civilized, I have the urge to be mischievous sometimes... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: As much as I try to be civilized, I have the urge to be mischievous somes...

Entries.DialogueText: They say it's a condition of my people.
Entries.DisplayPattern: They say it's a condition of my people.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, it's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, it's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable.

Entries.DialogueText: On nights like this, those who gaze out windows sometimes see shadowy figures. To think... it might've been me. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: On nights like this, those who gaze out windows somes see shadowy figures. To think... it might've been me.

Entries.DialogueText: If the other shadow people knew about our living arrangement, they would... 'punish' me. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If the other shadow people knew about our living arrangement, they would... 'punish' me.

Entries.DialogueText: Most of them despise humans, you know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most of them despise humans, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: You're sopping wet, and cold! Isn't that dangerous to your species? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're sopping wet, and cold! Isn't that dangerous to your species?

Entries.DialogueText: I already had dinner, but it wasn't something you'd be able to eat... sorry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I already had dinner, but it wasn't something you'd be able to eat... sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: Ever since I left my people, I've been searching for a new home... now I belong somewhere. That means everything to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ever since I left my people, I've been searching for a new home... now I belong somewhere. That means everything to me.

Entries.DialogueText: It's said that my people came here long ago, when a great catastrophe allowed spirits from the void to cross into the physical plane.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's said that my people came here long ago, when a great catastrophe allowed spirits from the void to cross into the physical plane.

Entries.DialogueText: The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting.

Entries.DialogueText: The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too.

Entries.DialogueText: We're so physically different that it's a challenge to live together, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're so physically different that it's a challenge to live together, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: I hope the humidity here isn't bothersome to you. We both have to compromise in order to live together!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope the humidity here isn't bothersome to you. We both have to compromise in order to live together!

Entries.DialogueText: What's your plan for the new year, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's your plan for the new year, ?

Entries.DialogueText: You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.

Entries.DialogueText: It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish.

Entries.DialogueText: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this of year.

Entries.DialogueText: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein!

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night...

Entries.DialogueText: You call this time of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You call this of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry... I already made %kid1 and %kid2 a void egg omelet.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry... I already made and a void egg omelet.

Entries.DialogueText: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We have to make sure and give a lot of attention now that we have . We don't want any jealousy between them.

Entries.DialogueText: I worry about the future of the children... But I trust that Yoba has a plan for them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I worry about the future of the children... But I trust that Yoba has a plan for them.

Entries.DialogueText: This house has been blessed with two children, now... Does that mean Yoba approves of our unconventional living arrangement?
Entries.DisplayPattern: This house has been blessed with two children, now... Does that mean Yoba approves of our unconventional living arrangement?

Entries.DialogueText: Brrr.... It's cold. I guess winter has arrived.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Brrr.... It's cold. I guess winter has arrived.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for letting me stay here, {Farmer_Name}. I'm looking forward to another great year! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for letting me stay here, . I'm looking forward to another great year!

Entries.DialogueText: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?

Entries.DialogueText: The darkness this time of year is very soothing. If only it were warmer!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The darkness this of year is very soothing. If only it were warmer!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... Just how I like it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... Just how I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: If you dwarves hadn't driven us from our ancestral home, we'd never have had to resort to violence!
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you dwarves hadn't driven us from our ancestral home, we'd never have had to resort to violence!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry about your family.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry about your family.

Entries.DialogueText: Come and get it, shrimpy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come and get it, shrimpy.

Entries.DialogueText: ...And I'm truly sorry about the past, Dwarf. I have no personal gripe with you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And I'm truly sorry about the past, Dwarf. I have no personal gripe with you.

Entries.DialogueText: Wh-what are you doing here? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wh-what are you doing here?

Entries.DialogueText: This is an amazing gift. For my people it is a great honor to receive something like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is an amazing gift. For my people it is a great honor to receive something like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you very much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you very much.

Entries.DialogueText: Humans have... interesting tastes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Humans have... interesting tastes.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... Um. I guess I'll accept it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... Um. I guess I'll accept it.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... Hey, it's me, Krobus. Could you recognize me? {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... Hey, it's me, Krobus. Could you recognize me?

Entries.DialogueText: If anyone approaches us, you do the talking, okay? {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If anyone approaches us, you do the talking, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Not all shadow people are like that! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not all shadow people are like that!

Entries.DialogueText: Krobus is stewing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Krobus is stewing...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not used to wearing clothes... It's very uncomfortable! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not used to wearing clothes... It's very uncomfortable!

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem*... Hello! I am very excited to be at the visual entertainment center and to consume the popped corn... just like you! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem*... Hello! I am very excited to be at the visual entertainment center and to consume the popped corn... just like you!

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper*... how am I doing? {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper*... how am I doing?

Entries.DialogueText: So, your species enjoys staring at flickering lights for hours on end? Very interesting... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, your species enjoys staring at flickering lights for hours on end? Very interesting...
